description: Construction of a part two storey part single storey rear extension, a two storey side extension and a porch
borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions:
<div>The proposed development by reason of scale, siting and design of the proposed development would result in an increased sense of overbearingness and a harmful loss of outlook and daylight to neighbouring occupiers. Specifically it would introduce unacceptable impacts of overshadowing, overbearing, loss of outlook, loss of daylight and loss of privacy to no.545. Due to the siting of the dwelling, the proposed development would introduce a sense of overbearing to both adjoining neighbours and would constitute undue harm to the existing amenity. The proposal is therefore constituting unneighbourly development and contrary to:<br></div><div><br></div><div><p><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: " pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="">-
National Planning Policy Framework </span>National Planning Policy Framework
(NPPF) (DLUHC, 2023)<o:p></o:p></p><p><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: " pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="">- Policy
D4 of the London Plan (March 2021);</span></p><p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; line-height: 107%; font-family: " pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="">- The Residential
Extensions and Alterations Supplementary Planning Document (February 2012);<o:p></o:p></span></p><p class="MsoNormal">









</p><p><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: " pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="">-
Policies SP2, DMD1 and DMD6 of </span>The London Borough of Barking and
Dagenham’s Local Plan: (September 2024)<o:p></o:p></p></div>

<div>The proposed development by reason of scale, siting and design of the proposed development are considered harmful to the appearance of the house, built form of the terrace and character of the area, notably given the location of the application site within the Becontree Estate. As such, the proposed development is contrary to:<br></div><div><br></div><div><p><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: " pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="">-
National Planning Policy Framework </span>National Planning Policy Framework
(NPPF) (DLUHC, 2023)<o:p></o:p></p><p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; line-height: 107%; font-family: " pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="">- Policy D4 of the
London Plan (March 2021)</span></p><p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; line-height: 107%; font-family: " pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="">- The Residential
Extensions and Alterations Supplementary Planning Document (February 2012)<o:p></o:p></span></p><p class="MsoNormal">









</p><p><b><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: " pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="">- </span></b><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: " pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="">Policies SP2, DMD1, DMD4 and DMD6 of </span>The London Borough of
Barking and Dagenham’s Local Plan: (September 2024)<o:p></o:p></p></div>
